401 // Return true if the split impulses position correction technique is used for contacts
402 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool ContactSolverSystem::isSplitImpulseActive() const {
403  return mIsSplitImpulseActive;
404 }
405 
406 // Activate or Deactivate the split impulses for contacts
407 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void ContactSolverSystem::setIsSplitImpulseActive(bool isActive) {
408  mIsSplitImpulseActive = isActive;
409 }
410 
411 // Compute the collision restitution factor from the restitution factor of each collider
412 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal ContactSolverSystem::computeMixedRestitutionFactor(const Material& material1, const Material& material2) const {
413 
414  const decimal restitution1 = material1.getBounciness();
415  const decimal restitution2 = material2.getBounciness();
416 
417  // Return the largest restitution factor
418  return (restitution1 > restitution2) ? restitution1 : restitution2;
419 }
420 
421 // Compute the mixed friction coefficient from the friction coefficient of each collider
422 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal ContactSolverSystem::computeMixedFrictionCoefficient(const Material& material1, const Material& material2) const {
423 
424  // Use the geometric mean to compute the mixed friction coefficient
425  return material1.getFrictionCoefficientSqrt() * material2.getFrictionCoefficientSqrt();
426 }
427

431 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void ContactSolverSystem::setProfiler(Profiler* profiler) {
432 
433  mProfiler = profiler;
434 }
435 
436 #endif

438 }
